DOC.brief_summary: To determine the level of citrulline to produce a given amount of arginine in healthy volunteers and surgical patients. Arginine-related amino acids are expected to increase as a result of increased substrate provided by citrulline.
DOC.brief_title: Dose-response Enteral Citrulline for Normal Healthy Volunteers and Surgery Patients
DOC.criteria: adults, male & female, nonpregnant BMI 18.529.9 cancer HIV positive
